detailedRequirements:
For this challenge we will be converting an inline partial into a modal.    This modal is the confirmation of winners dialog that happens once all the scorecards are scored.   All the logic for the announced winner is complete it just needs to be convert to a modal.   You will need to create a challenge with requirements in the app, then create some submissions with postman in order to development this feature.


Requirements:
 
1.  Download the challenge app from https://github.com/appirio-tech/lc1-challenge-app  and switch to the community branch otherwise you will get prompted for a login. 
2.  Create a challenge with multiple requirements then launch the challenge.
3.   Use postman or curl to change the status of the challenge from SUBMISSIONS 
4.  Using postman add  3 of  submissions.  Note you want to modify the submitterId for example if I create challenge 22 my I would  POST {{url}}/challenge/22/submissions   {  "submitterId": 300, "status": "VALID"}  or you can use curl:    curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Cache-Control: no-cache"  -d '{ "submitterId": 302,  "submitterHandle": "winky",   "status": "VALID" }' http://lc1-challenge-service.herokuapp.com/challenges/22/submissions
5.  Using CURL or POSTMAN change the status to 'REVIEW' curl -X PUT -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Cache-Control: no-cache" -d '{"title":  "Kyle's Most Excellent Challenge","status": "REVIEW"}' http://lc1-challenge-service.herokuapp.com/challenges/22, note title is required so you must pass it in the payload.
6.  Now navigate to the challenge listing and click on the review icon to your newly create challenge and complete the three reviews.   
7.  Next you need to click the button that says  'announce winner'.   
8.  You will see the announce winner dialog at the bottom.    Convert this to a modal window.  and make a few modifications based on this mockup:   https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/829556/4532727/a6d41894-4d95-11e4-9fd2-a63e0ff1072d.png  ( https://github.com/appirio-tech/lc1-project/issues/109) 
9.  Add the place icon in the first column. 
10.  Sum of the prize money below.
finalSubmissionGuidelines:
Submit your code and docs in a single zip file alone with a manfest of the changes (be sure to include the .git folder or you won’t pass)
A video is not necessary
